title: Bronze kiteshield

properties.name: description
properties.value: The Bronze kiteshield is the weakest smithable kiteshield, requiring 1 Defence to wield. A player with 12 Smithing can make the shield by using three bronze bars on an anvil while carrying a hammer, granting 37.5 Smithing experience. It can also be bought from Cassie's Shield Shop in Falador.

Item ID1189

The Bronze kiteshield is the weakest smithable kiteshield, requiring 1 Defence to wield. A player with 12 Smithing can make the shield by using three bronze bars on an anvil while carrying a hammer, granting 37.5 Smithing experience. It can also be bought from Cassie's Shield Shop in Falador.

 Attack bonuses
+0+0+0-8-3
 Defence bonuses
+5+7+6-1+6
 Other bonusesSlot
